choose.otherwise: `id` AS `id`, `user_id` AS `userId`, `order_id` AS `orderId`, `order_type` AS `orderType`, `fee` AS `fee`, `coin_type` AS `coinType`, `token` AS `token`, `contract` AS `contract`, `amount` AS `amount`, `receiver_address` AS `receiverAddress`, `type` AS `type`, `operator` AS `operator`, `create_time` AS `createTime`, `update_time` AS `updateTime`
